vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.26.31;
son of: Gilead (H1568H);
brother of: Abiezer (H0044I), Helek (H2507), Shechem (H7928), Shemida (H8061) and Hepher (H2660A)
Group of as.ri.el (אַשְׂרִיאֵל "Asriel" H0844)
§ Asrielites = "I shall be prince of God"
the clan descended from Ashriel
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Asriel, hijo de Galaad; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞斯烈族 这个形容詞在原文的意思是 "我將成為上帝的王子"
亞斯烈的後裔宗族(民 26:31)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚斯烈族 这个形容词在原文的意思是 "我将成为上帝的王子"
亚斯烈的后裔宗族(民 26:31)
